CatDescriptText: image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 24 reads: "Finest Hour - Roberto Clemente, center, enjoying his finest hour in Pittsburgh last Sunday when he was honored by the Dapper Dan Club as the city's top athlete in 1961. Shown with the National League's leading hitter is Gov. David Lawrence, left, and Al Abrams, originator of the Dapper Dan Club. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Governor David Lawrence and Al Abrams presenting Pittsburgh Pirates baseball player Roberto Clemente with plaque inscribed "Post-Gazette Dapper Dan Award to Roberto Clemente...February 4, 1962," at Dapper Dan banquet, Kings Garden, Hilton Hotel
CatSubject_tab: Clemente, Roberto, 1934-1972.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Awards--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Lawrence, David Leo, 1889-1966.Hilton Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
